content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
• No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. The agent repeatedly attempted to establish a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs, but all placement and crafting attempts failed due to missing inventory items and insufficient resources. Although log messages reference smelting operations at furnaces (for example, a furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0) used for additional iron plate production and a “copper furnace” at Position(–27.0, –60.0) for copper plate smelting), these actions were performed on pre‐existing entities and did not result in the creation of new, connected production structures.

ERROR TIPS
• Incorrect API Invocation for Entity Retrieval  
 – Pass arguments to get_entities according to its defined signature. Avoid using unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or providing unexpected positional arguments.

• Lab Placement Issues  
 – Confirm that the required Lab item is present in the inventory before attempting to place a Lab at a target location.

• Iteration on None Values  
 – Validate that any function returning a list (or collection) does not instead return None before attempting to iterate over it.

• Insufficient Sub‐Ingredient Availability for Lab Crafting  
 – Ensure that all prerequisite components (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables) are sufficiently produced. Establish complete resource chains—including successful smelting operations—so that crafting requirements for complex items like Labs are met.
